metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14332 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Clementine Music Player 1.3.1. Clementine.exe is vulnerable to a user mode write access violation due to a NULL pointer dereference in the Init call in the MoodbarPipeline::NewPadCallback function in moodbar/moodbarpipeline.cpp. The vulnerability is triggered when the user opens a malformed mp3 file.

criterions.comment: clementine package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
